product_name: Patagonia Ultralight Fiona Down Parka - Women's
long_description: The Patagonia Ultralight Fiona parka is made for the city, but has a built-for-the-mountains soul. This Fiona is featherweight, translucent and tough, with feminine styling and premium goose down. Made from translucent 0.8-oz. nylon ripstop (borrowed from the Patagonia Alpine line) and insulated with 800-fill-power premium European goose down. High-tear-strength shell is treated with a moisture-shedding Durable Water Repellent finish; asymmetrical, quilted construction keeps goose down from shifting. Hood and zip-through collar shun spindrift. Full-length, 2-way zipper. Femininely contoured with princess seams front and back. On-seam, zippered handwarmer pockets. Patagonia Ultralight Fiona parka has a slim fit.
short_description: The Patagonia Ultralight Fiona parka is made for the city, but has a built-for-the-mountains soul. This Fiona is featherweight, translucent and tough, with feminine styling and premium goose down.
